title: UK Power sharing in N. Ireland lowered conflict

content.question: Which of the following is an accurate description of why Great Britainâ€™s conflict in Northern Ireland has diminished since 1998 ?

choices.label: Britain allowed Northern Ireland to become an independent state in 1998.
Britain supported a power-sharing agreement between Protestant and Roman Catholic leaders in Northern Ireland.
The top Irish separatist leaders were imprisoned after surrendering to the British military.
Britain forced the government of Northern Ireland to permanently dissolve its regional government.
Northern Ireland formally merged with the government of the Republic of Ireland.

content.answer: Britain supported a power-sharing agreement between Protestant and Roman Catholic leaders in Northern Ireland.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
